tool_name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
tool_description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.
title: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji

utterances.utterance: Show me all kanji taught in grade 1.
List the kanji characters for grade 3 students.
What kanji are introduced in grade 5?
Give me the kanji for grade 2.
Which kanji do Japanese students learn in grade 4?
Can you show me the kanji taught in grade 7?
I want to see the kanji for grade 8.
What are the kanji for grade 10?

api_list.name: All Kanji Details
api_list.description: Language attributes and media files for all supported kanji (~ 6.5MB)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/kanji/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
